question:
Which among the services are eligible IT-enabled services under BPO operations in IBPS?
1. Call center
2. Back office operations
3. Data Processing
4. Payroll
Choose the correct option from the choices given below:
explanation:
As per Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT)Â  the list of eligible IT enabled services under BPO operations considered in IBPS are as under:
i) Back office operations.
ii) Call centres.
iii) Content Development or Animation.
iv) Data Processing.
vi) Geographic information System Services.
vii) Human Resource Services.
viii) Insurance Claim processing.
ix) Legal Databases.
x) Medical Transcription.
xi) Payroll.
xii) Remote Maintenance.
xiii) Revenue Accounting.
xiv) Support Centres.
xv) Website services.
